silence_commands.label: Silence Commands
silence_commands.description: Remove the message when a moderator uses a command

roles.label: Log Role Changes
roles.description: When enabled, logs role changes to User Logs

messages.label: Message Logs Channel
messages.description: Logs channel for any kind of message

traffic.label: Traffic Logs Channel
traffic.description: Logs channel for when users join/leave or are banned

users.label: User Logs Channel
users.description: Logs channel for user-related changes like roles

management.label: Management Logs Channel
management.description: Logs channel for things like channel creation

actions.label: Action Logs Channel
actions.description: Logs channel for actions like bans or kicks

nsfw.label: NSFW Logs Channel
nsfw.description: Logs channel for the bot's NSFW detection
